titles.title: PLANT Act of 2020
PLANT Act of 2020
Protecting Lands Against Narcotics Trafficking Act of 2020
Protecting Lands Against Narcotics Trafficking Act of 2020
PLANT Act of 2020

To impose enhanced penalties for conduct relating to unlawful production of a controlled substance on Federal property or while intentionally trespassing on the property of another that causes environmental damage, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committees on Energy and Commerce, Natural Resources, and Agriculture, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
